ygData.subject: Re: Selos Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sounds like texture differences to me. Run through a flat plain, slow. Run by a building fast. Run down a narrow pass, fast. Run out into a valley, slow.
ygData.messageBody:
> > > Snow does slow you down noticably.
> >
> > I can't see how this can be true. But, tonight I'll check it out by
> > measuring thetime it takes to run X distance (using loc).
>
> running through Everfrost makes it plain, fast/not so fast/fast/not so fast
> as you run across dirt/snow patches. anyway I will be curious what the exact
> ratio is.

Sounds like texture differences to me. Run through a flat plain, slow. Run
by a building fast. Run down a narrow pass, fast. Run out into a valley,
slow. Run in a dirt patch with clearly defined, measurable edges, fast.
Run in the snow with fewer reliable units of measurement, slow.

But as I said, I'll just have to try and see for myself. =)
